name: Basketball Battle!
description:
Sink as many shots as you can in quick-fire finger basketball matches! An easy to play, but hard to master basketball challenge with huge rewards and prizes!

Includes tournaments and head-to-head competitions with real cash prizes (where available).

You miss 100% of the shots you don't take!

How To Play:
• Pull back & release to shoot the basketball
• Drag left or right to rotate the basketball shooter
• Make as many shots as possible
• Get a bonus for being more accurate (percentage of missed shots versus total shots during a match)
• Score 3 shots in a row and start making those 3 pointers!

Becoming a Pro goes a long way!
• In this quick-fire game, every shot matters. You get 90 seconds for each round to score as many shots as you can.
• Accuracy bonus for not missing shots. Bonuses are the key to victory!


The ultimate basketball experience!
• Matches can be played head-to-head with other players or in large, multiplayer tournaments.
• In this head-to-head game, both players get the exact gameplay with the same backboard movements. The player who finishes with the most points win.
• Challenge people around the world with Skillz, a competition platform complete with leaderboards, trophies, Cash or Virtual Currency prizes, and an amazing loyalty program that rewards you for playing!
• Cash tournaments are available in about 75% of the world. Cash tournaments are not enabled in the following states: AZ, AR, CT, DE, FL, IL, LA, MD, MT, SC, SD, and TN. If you don't live in a cash-enabled region, you can still play for fun with our virtual currency.
